Mason Fernandez 
 
 
 
 masonfernandez@outlook.com Orem, Utah (253) 227-9698 
 linkedin.com/in/mason-fernandez/ 
 
masonfernandez.com 
  
 
Technical Abilities 
 
   Languages: Python, SQL Databases, Javascript / Typescript, C++ 
   Tools: Figma, Git, Node.js, React, Svelte  
 
Experience 
 
UX / Product Design Intern 
Solo LLC, Lehi UT 
August - December 2024 
 
● Reduced proposal time by 10% through usability research and incorporating user 
feedback to streamline the UI. 
● Designed and developed reusable UI components in Figma, coordinating handoff and 
collaborating with developers to ensure seamless implementation. 
● Led team meetings on FigJam where we developed wireframes, user personas, and 
practiced facilitation and brainstorming. 
 
Projects 
 
Portfolio Site - Personal project featuring latest LLM / web dev technology 
● Utilized OpenAI APIs and Ollama to deploy a local chatbot with custom roles and an 
input stream, enabling dynamic response loading. 
● Integrated multiple RESTful APIs, including Pokémon and Shark Attack, to experiment 
with data interactions and enhance website functionality. 
● Implemented RAG functionality as well as interchangeable locally hosted models on 
docker 
 
Raspberry Pi IoT - Created a Python library for diy open source IOT devices 
● Developed a Python Flask web server to manage and coordinate secure connections 
between IoT devices. 
● Used Tauri to create a desktop React application for displaying logs from IoT sensors. 
● Created class diagrams and implemented automated unit testing to ensure the 
scalability and maintaina

ces. 
● Used Tauri to create a desktop React application for displaying logs from IoT sensors. 
● Created class diagrams and implemented automated unit testing to ensure the 
scalability and maintainability of the project. 
 
Education 
 
Utah Valley University 
B.S. Computer Science 
Senior, 3.86 GPA 
Graduating May 2025
